Take some tables which are related in some way and group them together

## Types of JOINS
- JOIN / INNER JOIN - only get things that match
- LEFT OUTER JOIN - include all rows in the left table even if they don't have matches
- RIGHT OUTER JOIN
- FULL OUTER JOIN

## Selecting from two or more tables

Need to specify how they are related

### Which flight is Alice on?
```sql
SELECT origin, destination, name FROM flights JOIN passengers ON passengers.flight_id = flights.id WHERE name = 'Alice';
```
